text: Family Four was a band from Sweden. They represented Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest 1971 with "Vita vidder" and at Eurovision Song Contest 1972 with "Härliga sommardag". ==Discography== *1971 (1971) *Family Four's jul (1971) *Picknick (1972) *Family Four på Berns (1973) *Family Four: Guldkorn (2000) == References == Category:Swedish musical groups
title: Family Four
